title: # 466 - Iliza Shlesinger & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Iliza Shlesinger. We talk about being a morning person, doing stand up, cold showers, doing a sex scene with Mark Wahlberg, meeting Seinfeld, acting, and much more!

 

Check out Iliza’s latest movie “The Right One” on demand today! 

 

This episode is brought to you by Hims. Go to http://www.forhims.com/bertcast for your 90 day risk free trial.
